KSIE Java SDK 1.2.189 API

Packages 
Package Description
com.guardtime.envelope  
com.guardtime.envelope.annotation
Creating and adding annotations, thus context, to the KSI envelope
com.guardtime.envelope.document
Adding data to the KSI envelope
com.guardtime.envelope.extending
General interfaces and classes to perform signature extending
com.guardtime.envelope.extending.ksi
Extending implementation for the KSI signatures
com.guardtime.envelope.hash
The hash algorithm provider to be used throughout the code
com.guardtime.envelope.indexing
Classes and interfaces for various indexing
com.guardtime.envelope.manifest
Creating and handling envelope structure manifests
com.guardtime.envelope.manifest.tlv
Creating and handling of the manifests with TLV (Type Length Value) structure
com.guardtime.envelope.packaging
Creating an envelope
com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.exception
Set of packaging related exceptions
com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.parsing
Envelope parsing
com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.parsing.handler
Content handling (documents, annotations, manifests, etc)
com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.parsing.store
Storing parsed data
com.guardtime.envelope.packaging.zip
ZIP implementation of the envelope packaging
com.guardtime.envelope.signature
General classes and interfaces for all possible signature implementations
com.guardtime.envelope.signature.ksi
Implementation of the KSI signature
com.guardtime.envelope.signature.postponed
Implementation of the delegated signature, to allow postponing of the actual signing
com.guardtime.envelope.util
Set of helper classes
com.guardtime.envelope.verification
Envelope's verification
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.policy
Defining of the verification policies
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.result
Creating and handling of the verification results
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule
Creating and handling of the verification rules
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.generic
Implementation of general verification rules
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature
Signature specific verification rules
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.signature.ksi
Implementation of KSI signature verification rules
com.guardtime.envelope.verification.rule.state
Setting and indicating the rule's state
